content: Bored Panda has shared questionable haircuts from around the world READ MORE:  Food for thought! Home cooks reveal their best hacksHair styles are down to personal preference, but these haircuts are so questionable, it will make you wonder what the stylist was thinking.

People from the US, the UK and Australia have shared snaps of outlandish manes they've come across in a gallery collated by the trivia website Bored Panda. One man from the US decided to sculpt and dye his locks to resemble a pizza, perhaps as a tribute to his favourite meal. Meanwhile, one person at an Aussie amusement park had such matted hair that they gathered the ends into the shape of a shoe.  And another snap showed a man's bold choice of cut, which some felt made him look like a thumb.

Meanwhile, a woman from South Carolina was left with an unruly knot of curls sticking up at the front of her hair after twisting her hair into knots while she slept. The result was a far cry from the glamorous wavy hairstyle she was no doubt hoping to achieve. Elsewhere, a pineapple enthusiast decided to dye and cut their locks like the fruit, with somewhat dubious results.
